Description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Italian pizza topped with tomato, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Sushi Rolls are made with vinegared rice, seaweed, and various ingredients such as fish, vegetables, and avocado, rolled together and sliced into bite-sized pieces.

A hamburger consists of a grilled or fried patty of ground beef or alternative meat, served in a sliced bun with various toppings such as lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments like ketchup and mustard.

Pad Thai is a stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as a street food and in restaurants in Thailand. It typically includes ingredients such as rice noodles, tofu, shrimp, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.

A croissant is a buttery, flaky, pastry of Austrian origin, named for its crescent shape. It is made of a layered yeast-leavened dough, rolled and folded several times in succession, then rolled into a sheet, in the same manner as puff pastry.

Tacos are traditional Mexican dishes consisting of a corn or wheat tortilla folded or rolled around a filling, which can include various meats such as beef, chicken, pork, seafood, or vegetables, along with cheese, salsa, guacamole, and other toppings.
Sushi Nigiri is a type of sushi consisting of a slice of raw fish over pressed vinegared rice. It is often served with a small amount of wasabi paste and soy sauce.
Pasta Carbonara is a classic Italian dish made with pasta, eggs, pancetta or bacon, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper. The eggs create a creamy sauce when mixed with the hot pasta.

Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular Indian dish made with marinated and grilled chicken chunks served in a rich, creamy, tomato-based sauce, flavored with Indian spices such as garam masala, cumin, and coriander.
Sushi Sashimi is a Japanese delicacy consisting of thinly sliced, raw fish or seafood served without rice. It is often accompanied by soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
